00005 SimplePathlossConstMapping::SimplePathlossConstMapping(const DimensionSet& dimensions,
00006                              SimplePathlossModel* model,
00007                              const double distFactor) :
00008   SimpleConstMapping(dimensions),
00009   distFactor(distFactor),
00010   model(model),
00011   hasFrequency(dimensions.hasDimension(Dimension::frequency_static()))

00015 double SimplePathlossConstMapping::getValue(const Argument& pos) const
00016 {
00017   double freq = model->carrierFrequency;
00018   if(hasFrequency) {
00019     assert(pos.hasArgVal(Dimension::frequency));
00020     freq = pos.getArgValue(Dimension::frequency);
00021   }
00022   double wavelength = BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight / freq;
00023   return (wavelength * wavelength) * distFactor;
00024 }

00028 void SimplePathlossModel::filterSignal(Signal& s){
00029 
00031   simtime_t sStart = s.getSignalStart();
00032   simtime_t sEnd = s.getSignalLength() + sStart;
00033 
00035   Coord sendersPos = s.getMove().getPositionAt(sStart);
00036   Coord myPos = myMove.getPositionAt(sStart);
00037 
00039   double sqrDistance = useTorus ? myPos.sqrTorusDist(sendersPos, playgroundSize)
00040                   : myPos.sqrdist(sendersPos);
00041 
00042   debugEV << "sqrdistance is: " << sqrDistance << endl;
00043 
00044   if(sqrDistance <= 1.0) {
00045     //attenuation is negligible
00046     return;
00047   }
00048 
00049   // wavelength in metres
00050   double wavelength = (BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight/carrierFrequency);
00051   debugEV << "wavelength is: " << wavelength << endl;
00052 
00053   double distFactor = pow(sqrDistance, -pathLossAlphaHalf) / (16.0 * M_PI * M_PI);
00054   debugEV << "distance factor is: " << distFactor << endl;
00055 
00056   bool hasFrequency = s.getTransmissionPower()->getDimensionSet().hasDimension(Dimension::frequency);
00057 
00058   const DimensionSet& domain = hasFrequency ? DimensionSet::timeFreqDomain : DimensionSet::timeDomain;
00059 
00060   SimplePathlossConstMapping* attMapping = new SimplePathlossConstMapping(
00061                           domain,
00062                           this,
00063                           distFactor);
00064 
00065   /* at last add the created attenuation mapping to the signal */
00066   s.addAttenuation(attMapping);
00067 }
00068 
00069 double SimplePathlossModel::calcPathloss(const Coord& myPos, const Coord& sendersPos)
00070 {
00071   /*
00072    * maybe we can reuse an already calculated value for the square-distance
00073    * at this point.
00074    *
00075    */
00076   double sqrdistance = 0.0;
00077 
00078   if (useTorus)
00079   {
00080     sqrdistance = myPos.sqrTorusDist(sendersPos, playgroundSize);
00081   } else
00082   {
00083     sqrdistance = myPos.sqrdist(sendersPos);
00084   }
00085 
00086   debugEV << "sqrdistance is: " << sqrdistance << endl;
00087 
00088   double attenuation = 1.0;
00089   // wavelength in metres
00090   double wavelength = (BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight/carrierFrequency);
00091 
00092   debugEV << "wavelength is: " << wavelength << endl;
00093 
00094   if (sqrdistance > 1.0)
00095   {
00096     attenuation = (wavelength * wavelength) / (16.0 * M_PI * M_PI)
00097             * (pow(sqrdistance, -1.0*pathLossAlphaHalf));
00098   }
00099 
00100   debugEV << "attenuation is: " << attenuation << endl;
00101 
00102   return attenuation;
00103 }
